thread.title: RA News: The Chemical Brothers, Helena Hauff join Nuits Sonores 2017
thread.title_full: RA News: The Chemical Brothers, Helena Hauff join Nuits Sonores 2017

title: RA News: The Chemical Brothers, Helena Hauff join Nuits Sonores 2017
text: The Chemical Brothers, Helena Hauff join Nuits Sonores 2017 Words / Tue / 14 Feb 2017 / 9:05 PM Category / Share this news story Fatima Yamaha, Floating Points and Talaboman have also been added to the French festival's night programme. Nuits Sonores has added a new round of names to the lineup of its 15th edition. The Lyon festival, taking place from Wednesday, May 24th through Sunday, May 28th, has lined up DJ slots for The Chemical Brothers , Helena Hauff , Talaboman, FunkinEven , Errorsmith , Mind Against , Beautiful Swimmers , Sonja Moonear and festival organiser P.Moore , among others. French DJs Francois X and Bambounou —the latter was the subject of an RA ORIGINS feature in 2015—will play back-to-back.
